# Drone News 48h Brief — January 19, 2026

_Window: last 48 hours; 27 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, there has been a notable increase in drone-related incidents, particularly involving Ukraine and Russia. Ukrainian drone strikes have caused widespread power outages in Russian-occupied regions, with multiple reports of similar incidents mentioning the use of drones in warfare. Meanwhile, efforts by security forces in regions like Timbuktu have successfully repelled drone attacks from terrorist groups such as Boko Haram. Additionally, multiple stories have surfaced regarding criminal activities involving drone smuggling into prisons in the UK. The events reflect a growing complexity in both military operations and criminal uses of drone technology, raising ongoing concerns about drone regulations and public safety across different jurisdictions.

**By category:** airport: 1 • arrest: 2 • crash: 1 • other: 16 • smuggling: 6 • terrorism: 1
**Top queries:** drone terrorism (7), drone incident (6), drone prison (5), drone arrest (3), drone crash (3)
